description.value:
Level 1 Conjuration

Casting Time: 1 bonus

Range: undefined self

Components: V

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

As you hit the target, grasping vines appear on it, and it makes a Strength saving throw. A Large or larger creature has Advantage|XPHB on this save. On a failed save, the target has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the spell ends. On a successful save, the vines shrivel away, and the spell ends. While Restrained|XPHB, the target takes 1d6 Piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. The target or a creature within reach of it can take an action to make a Strength (Athletics|XPHB) check against your spell save DC. On a success, the spell ends.

At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 1d6|1-9|1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.
